name: com.meta.xr.sdk.audio
description: Comprehensive spatial audio features for immersive applications, including a spatial audio renderer with HRTF, ambisonic audio playback, and room acoustics for creating immersive environments.

samples.description: Scenes that demonstrate Meta XR SDK Audio features
